com.qtplaf.library.trading.chart

Class JChartPlotterListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.qtplaf.library.swing.event.MouseHandler
      • com.qtplaf.library.trading.chart.JChartPlotterListener
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.MouseListener, java.awt.event.MouseMotionListener, java.awt.event.MouseWheelListener, java.util.EventListener

    public class JChartPlotterListener
extends MouseHandler
    Listener of event generated in the JChartPlotter.
    Author:
    Miquel Sas

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private JChartPlotter chartPlotter
      The parent JChartPlotter.
      private java.awt.Cursor cursor
      The saved cursor when mouse enters the component.
      private boolean mouseDragging
      Mouse dragging control (left button) to scroll the chart.
      private int mouseDraggingX
      The previous X coordinate when mouse dragging (always in the chart/component area).
      private double wheelRotationFactor
      The wheel rotation factor.

    • Field Detail

      • chartPlotter

        private JChartPlotter chartPlotter
        The parent JChartPlotter.

      • wheelRotationFactor

        private double wheelRotationFactor
        The wheel rotation factor. Wheel rotations are always 1, but rotation for scroll and zoom require a factor of the number of bars visible.

      • mouseDragging

        private boolean mouseDragging
        Mouse dragging control (left button) to scroll the chart.

      • mouseDraggingX

        private int mouseDraggingX
        The previous X coordinate when mouse dragging (always in the chart/component area).

      • cursor

        private java.awt.Cursor cursor
        The saved cursor when mouse enters the component.
